DOC.brief_title: Ticagrelor Versus High-dose Clopidogrel Patients With High Platelet Reactivity Clopidogrel After PCI
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , single-blind , investigator-initiated study parallel design . Patients coronary artery disease undergo percutaneous coronary intervention present high platelet reactivity clopidogrel assess PL-11 analyzer ( platelet maximum aggregation ratio [ MAR % ] ≥ 55 % ) 2 hour post-clopidogrel 300mg LD ( Day 0 ) , randomize informed consent , 1:1 ratio follow treatment group : Group Α : Ticagrelor 180 mg immediate loading ( Day 0 ) follow 180mg/day start Day 1 Day 365 ( 12 month randomization ) . Group Β : Clopidogrel 150mg per day , start Day 1 Day 365 ( 12 month randomization ) . Platelet reactivity assessment perform randomization ( Day 0 ) , 3-day randomization ( Day 3 ) . Documentation major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event ( death , myocardial infarction , stent thrombosis , stroke , revascularization procedure PCI CABG ) serious adverse event ( bleed , adverse event ) perform 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Patients agree experimental plan permit IRB ; Patients plan take dual antiplatelet therapy 12 month . Severe hepatic dysfunction define serum transaminase > 3 time normal limit ; Renal dysfunction define eGFR < 30ml/min/1.73m^2 ; Comorbidity estimate life expectancy < 50 % 12 month ; Scheduled surgery next 12 month , result protocol change ; Known allergy study drug device ; Use glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor perioperative period ; Anticoagulation treatment include warfarin .
